description: Vite configuration file for a React project, including server and build settings tailored for CI environments and containerized deployments.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Main configuration function from Vite to set project build and development server options.

methods.name: loadEnv
methods.description: Function to load environment variables based on mode and root directory.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a system path, used for resolving the current file's path.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Function to get directory name from a path, used to resolve the project root.
